Article/0-0-0-18/context-page.title: Context Page
Article/0-0-0-18/context-page.html:
• Type: object<\/code><\/li>
  • Origin: Nullstack Context<\/a><\/li>
  • Availability: server/client<\/li>
  • readwrite<\/strong> in server/client context<\/li> <\/ul>

    It gives you information about the document head<\/code> metatags.<\/p>

    page<\/code> keys will be used to generate metatags during server-side rendering<\/a> and must be assigned before initiate<\/code><\/a> while this resolved.<\/p>

    The following keys are available in the object:<\/p>

    • title<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • image<\/strong>: string<\/code> (absolute or relative URL)<\/li>
    • description<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • canonical<\/strong>: string<\/code> (absolute or relative URL)<\/li>
    • locale<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • robots<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • schema<\/strong>: object<\/code><\/li>
    • changes<\/strong>: string<\/code><\/li>
    • priority<\/strong>: number<\/code><\/li>
    • status<\/strong>: number<\/code><\/li> <\/ul>

      When the title<\/code> key is assigned on the client-side, the document title will be updated.<\/p>

      Nullstack uses the changes<\/code> and priority<\/code> keys to generate the sitemap.xml<\/strong>.<\/p>

      The sitemap is generated automatically only when using static site generation<\/a> and must be manually generated in server-side rendered<\/a> applications.<\/p>

      The changes<\/code> key represents the changefreq<\/code> key in the sitemap.xml<\/strong> and if assigned must be one of the following values:<\/p>

      • always<\/strong><\/li>
      • hourly<\/strong><\/li>
      • daily<\/strong><\/li>
      • weekly<\/strong><\/li>
      • monthly<\/strong><\/li>
      • yearly<\/strong><\/li>
      • never<\/strong><\/li> <\/ul>

        The priority<\/code> key is a number between 0.0<\/code> and 1.0<\/code> that represents the priority<\/code> key in the sitemap.xml<\/strong>.<\/p>

        Nullstack does not set a default priority, however, sitemaps assume a 0.5<\/code> priority when not explicitly set.<\/p>

        Besides title<\/code> and locale<\/code> all other keys have sensible defaults generated based on the application scope.<\/p> 

        import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Page<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  prepare<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>project,<\/span> page}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    page.<\/span>title =<\/span> `<\/span>${<\/span>project.<\/span>name}<\/span><\/span> - Page Title<\/span>`<\/span><\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>image =<\/span> '/image.jpg'<\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>description =<\/span> 'Page meta description'<\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>canonical =<\/span> 'http://absolute.url/canonical-link'<\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>locale =<\/span> 'pt-BR'<\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>robots =<\/span> 'index, follow'<\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>schema =<\/span> {<\/span>}<\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>changes =<\/span> 'weekly'<\/span>;<\/span>
    page.<\/span>priority =<\/span> 1<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>page}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>div<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        <<\/span>h1<\/span>><\/span><\/span>{<\/span>page.<\/span>title}<\/span></<\/span>h1<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        <<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>{<\/span>page.<\/span>description}<\/span></<\/span>p<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
      </<\/span>div<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Page;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

        Custom Events<\/a><\/h2>
        Updating page.title<\/code> will raise a custom event.<\/p>

        import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Analytics<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  hydrate<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>page}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    window.<\/span>addEventListener<\/span>(<\/span>page.<\/span>event,<\/span> (<\/span>)<\/span> =><\/span> {<\/span>
      console.<\/span>log<\/span>(<\/span>`<\/span>New title: <\/span>${<\/span>page.<\/span>title}<\/span><\/span>`<\/span><\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
    }<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Analytics;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

        

        ð¥ page.event<\/code> is only available in client functions/lifecycles.<\/p>
<\/blockquote>

        Error pages<\/a><\/h2>
        If during the server-side render<\/a> process the page.status<\/code> has any value besides 200<\/code>, your application will receive another render pass that gives you the chance to adjust the interface according to the status.<\/p>

        The status<\/code> key will be raised with the HTTP response.<\/p>

        The page status will be modified to 500<\/code> and receive another render pass if the page raise an exception while rendering.<\/p>

        The status of server functions<\/a> responses will be set to the page.status<\/code>.<\/p>

        import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> ErrorPage from<\/span> './ErrorPage'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> HomePage from<\/span> './HomePage'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Application<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  // ...<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>page}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>main<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        {<\/span>page.<\/span>status !==<\/span> 200<\/span> &&<\/span> <<\/span>ErrorPage<\/span><\/span> route<\/span>=<\/span>"<\/span>*"<\/span><\/span> /><\/span><\/span>}<\/span>
        <<\/span>HomePage<\/span><\/span> route<\/span>=<\/span>"<\/span>/"<\/span><\/span> /><\/span><\/span>
      </<\/span>main<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Application;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

        

        ð¥ Assigning to the status<\/code> key during the single-page application<\/a> mode will have no effect.<\/p>
<\/blockquote>
Article/0-0-0-18/context-page.description: The page object is a proxy in the Nullstack Context available in both client and server and gives you information about the document head metatags
